profile:
Dodds Garage Door Systems gives new meaning to the word "reliability".
"We show up when we say we will, we do the job with the expertise of over 52 years in the business, and we tidy up. We never leave a mess!"
"When you require garage door service or garage door electric opener attention, please call us. You won't be sorry. We guarantee it!"
Having done that, just sit down and relax, you have just hired Greater Toronto's #1 garage door company, Dodds Garage Door Systems is your RELIABLE garage door firm.
Dodds major products are "SERVICE", "VALUE", and "CUSTOMER SATISFACTION!"

Dodds Garage Door Systems Inc. is an all-Canadian privately owned company, established in 1958, specializing in the sale, repairs, service and installation of:

    Overhead Garage Doors- residential, commercial and industrial
    Electric Garage Door Openers - residential,
    commercial and industrial
    Associated Safety Systems
    Preventive Maintenance Programs
    Barrier Gates

Also, we go through constant updates for new ways to help us remain updated. All our team go by industrial standards, including our project managers.

That helps our customers rely on our garage door services. And to trust us with their overhead garage doors. We know many different ways to help resolve garage door issues and save valuable time. There are several door types in the market today. You’re going to have the ability to choose one according to your needs. 

If your home safety is essential, you need to install garage doors; garages are not only used to store cars. Nowadays, they are also used to store essential items, tools, and used as extra storage.

Our company offers a complete picture of the appearance of your plan. In reality, most people have become aware of how their house looks, especially when it’s at the entrance to the house. After all, the garage door is one of the essential features to buy as it relates to the health of your vehicle.

profile:
Fix It Right Garage Doors has been in the industry for years, meaning that when it comes to experience within the GTA, we are your best bet. Our company is one of the most reputable, trusted names in garage door repairs and installations. We offer a variety of products, installing, replacing parts and repairing locally. Our technicians are capable of a number of repair and installation services such as: Residential and commercial garage door installations, garage repair and maintenance, fixing snapped or broken cables and installation of new motors. 

We operate on the basis of full transparency, meaning we will never mislead our customers in any way. Our only goal is to ensure your 100% satisfaction with our repair or installation services, which is why we offer a lifetime warranty on all services and offer complete diagnostics before undertaking any repairs or installations. We help you determine the correct course of action for your budget, home’s exterior, garage door and needs. In order to fully support you, we offer only the best brands in the industry such as LiftMaster, Richards-Wilcox, Clopay, Genie, Steel-Craft, C.H.I, Pentagon and Haas doors. Our spare parts are from genuine manufacturers, and we stock parts for almost all makes and models of garage door. In this way, we can guarantee your satisfaction with our services.

Call us now and experience the difference our superior technical skills, expansive selection and committment to transparency can offer you. Contact us for a service call!

Fix It Right Garage Door Repair, Installation & Replacement in Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, Vaughan, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Aurora, Newmarket, Brampton, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Nobleton, Caledon, Milton, Innisfil, Bradford, Barrie, Pickering, Stouffville, Ajax, Oshawa & more.

profile:
Geo Garage Doors is a reliable and highly-trained family-owned business operating throughout the Greater Toronto Area. Each day, residential homeowners across Ontario choose Geo Garage Doors to service their needs. Whether you need maintenance or installation, we are here to help.

Our mission is to improve the safety, security, and convenience of residences in the communities we serve. We fulfill this goal by installing, maintaining and servicing all types of garage doors. We specialize in door repair, replacement, installation, openers and more.

​Each project is more than just a project. We listen to your concerns, brainstorm convenient & creative solutions, and we make sure the job is always done right, properly, and on time.

profile:
Since 2009, Canadoor Door Systems has been bringing professionalism to the garage door industry. To ensure we perform every job to the highest standard, whether you need a garage door repair or installation, our technicians undergo a rigorous training process until we’re confident they are ready to enter the field.

We provide service across Ontario, with showrooms in Bolton, Barrie, Sudbury and Thunder Bay, where you can meet our team and browse our selection of garage doors. Whether you’re a homeowner in need of a garage door repair, new installation or a business looking for preventative maintenance on your commercial properties, we can help.
